summary: Completed UI/UX overhaul verification for 6 mobile settings screens (Profile, Billing, Wallet, Language, Notifications, Privacy). All screens correctly use PageHeader component (except WalletScreen which has custom header with copy button). TypeScript compiles with 0 errors. All screens use BottomSheetScreen wrapper, consistent borderRadius: 20 styling, and proper animations (fadeAnim + slideAnim).

issues: Missing testID attributes for automated testing - only LanguageScreen has 1 testID
design_issues.note: Not blocking functionality but impacts automated UI testing

passed_tests: TypeScript compiles with 0 errors
ProfileScreen - uses PageHeader with title='Profile' and subtitle=user email
ProfileScreen - shows NET BALANCE hero card with You Owe/Owed to You stats
ProfileScreen - has profile edit functionality (fullName, nickname) with Save Changes button
ProfileScreen - has Danger Zone with Delete Account option
BillingScreen - uses PageHeader with title='Billing' and subtitle='Subscription & payments'
BillingScreen - shows current Free Plan with active pill and feature list
BillingScreen - has SUBSCRIPTION OPTIONS section with Coming Soon banner
BillingScreen - has LEGAL section with Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, Acceptable Use Policy links
WalletScreen - uses custom header with close button and copy wallet ID button (rightElement pattern)
WalletScreen - shows balance card with wallet ID and AVAILABLE BALANCE
WalletScreen - has Send/Receive/Deposit/Withdraw action buttons
WalletScreen - displays RECENT TRANSACTIONS with transaction history
LanguageScreen - uses PageHeader with title from translation context
LanguageScreen - shows AVAILABLE LANGUAGES with flag, native name, and selection indicator (checkmark-circle)
LanguageScreen - has language-option-{code} testID for each language option
NotificationsScreen - uses PageHeader with dynamic subtitle showing badge count
NotificationsScreen - displays PENDING INVITES with accept/decline buttons
NotificationsScreen - shows ACTIVITY list with notification icons and timestamps
NotificationsScreen - has PUSH NOTIFICATIONS section with toggles for Game Updates, Settlements, Group Invites
PrivacyScreen - uses PageHeader with title='Privacy' and subtitle='Data & permissions'
PrivacyScreen - shows trust banner with shield icon and privacy links
PrivacyScreen - has DATA USAGE section with Help improve Kvitt toggle
PrivacyScreen - has YOUR RIGHTS section with Export data and Request deletion options
All 6 screens use BottomSheetScreen wrapper for consistent modal presentation
All screens use consistent borderRadius: 20 for cards (curved edges)
All screens use fadeAnim + slideAnim for entrance animations
All 6 screens have proper navigation.goBack() on close
Navigation registration verified - all 6 screens in RootNavigator

PageHeader_usage.WalletScreen: Custom header with copy button (intentional - needs rightElement for wallet ID copy)
PageHeader_usage.LanguageScreen: title=t.settings.language, subtitle='Select your preferred language', onClose=navigation.goBack()

styling_consistency.borderRadius_20: All screens use borderRadius: 20 for cards
styling_consistency.animations: All screens use fadeAnim + slideAnim with ANIMATION.spring.bouncy
styling_consistency.sectionLabels: All screens use uppercase section labels with letterSpacing: 1

content_verification.ProfileScreen: User profile info, balance display, edit functionality, danger zone
content_verification.BillingScreen: Current plan, subscription options, legal links
content_verification.WalletScreen: Balance card, send/receive/deposit/withdraw buttons, transaction history
content_verification.NotificationsScreen: Pending invites, activity list, push settings
content_verification.PrivacyScreen: Data usage toggle, privacy links, user rights section

action_items: Consider adding testID attributes to all interactive elements in the 6 screens for better automated testing (currently only LanguageScreen has testID)
Consider updating WalletScreen to use PageHeader with rightElement prop for consistency (optional - current implementation is functional)
critical_code_review_comments: PageHeader component is well-designed with title, subtitle, onClose, and optional rightElement props
All screens follow consistent animation pattern (fadeAnim, slideAnim with ANIMATION.spring.bouncy)
BottomSheetScreen provides consistent modal presentation with curved corners (borderRadius: 48)
Color theming is properly implemented via useTheme() hook across all screens
WalletScreen intentionally uses custom header to accommodate wallet ID copy button functionality
seed_data_creation: None - code structure verification only (React Native mobile app)
context_for_next_testing_agent: UI/UX overhaul for 6 settings screens completed and verified: ProfileScreen (profile info, balance, edit), BillingScreen (plan, subscriptions, legal), WalletScreen (balance, transactions, send/receive/deposit/withdraw), LanguageScreen (language selection), NotificationsScreen (invites, activity, push settings), PrivacyScreen (data usage, privacy links, user rights). All screens use PageHeader (except WalletScreen custom header), BottomSheetScreen wrapper, consistent borderRadius: 20 styling, and fadeAnim/slideAnim animations. TypeScript compiles with 0 errors. This is a React Native/Expo mobile app - Playwright UI testing is not applicable.
mobile_app_note: This is a React Native/Expo mobile app (not web). UI testing via Playwright browser automation is not possible. All verification done through code structure analysis and TypeScript compilation.
